pages.title: Wild Crops
pages.text: Farmers Delight adds 4 new Crops(Cabbage, Onion, Tomato, Rice),that can be found in the Wild and a Wild variant to 3 Vanilla Crops(Carrot, Potato, Beetroot).

pages.title: Wild Carrot
pages.text: Wild Carrots grow in Temperate climates(0.3 - 1.0 Temperature).

pages.title: Wild Potato
pages.text: Wild Potatoes grow in Cold climates(0.0 - 0.3 Temperature).

pages.title: Wild Onion
pages.text: Wild Onion grows in a Temperate climate(0.3 - 1.0 Temperature).

pages.title: Tomato Vines
pages.text: Tomato Vines grow in Arid climates(more than 1.0 Temperature).

pages.title: Wild Rice
pages.text: Grows in 1 Block Deep Water in Swamps or Jungles.
